CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Argo Blockchain PLC is a United Kingdom-based blockchain technology company. The Company is a global data center business that provides a platform for cryptocurrency mining operations. The principal activity of the Company is that of Bitcoin mining. With mining facilities in Quebec, mining operations in Texas, and offices in the United States, Canada, and the United Kingdom, the Companyâs operations are predominantly powered by renewable energy. Its crypto mining facilities include Baie Comeau, Mirabel, and Helios. Its Baie Comeau location is over 40,000 square feet and operates around 15 megawatts (MW). Its Mirabel mining facility has approximately 30,000 square feet of mining space. Helios is a 125,000 square foot bitcoin mining facility with 180 MW of power capacity. The Companyâs subsidiaries include Argo Innovation Labs Inc, Argo Operating US LLC, Argo Holdings US Inc., 9366-5230 and 9377-2556.
